name: CommuniFit
description: Fitness user management platform facilitating communication between trainers and clients. Responsible for frontend development and backend integration using Axios, Zustand for state management, Next.js 13, Tailwind CSS, and NextAuth for authentication.

name: CRYPTGO
description: Online casino platform utilizing cryptocurrency as payment method. Responsible for frontend-backend integration, pixel-perfect CSS with Styled Components based on Figma designs, and managing user interactions with games.

name: Cras
description: Web platform for cabin reservations. Served as technical lead, responsible for architecture selection, supporting trainees, and leading frontend migration from Angular to Next.js 15 with Bootstrap styling.

name: Mutual Data
description: Web application for processing and massive data visualization. Developed login with form validation using ChakraUI, connected backend APIs for data visualization, and ensured responsiveness across devices.

name: Mutual Pago
description: Virtual wallet web project. Led architecture selection, frontend development and backend integration with Zustand, Next.js 14, Sass, and NextAuth. Also led backend migration from ASP.NET Core to a RESTful .NET API.

name: Tus Cuentas
description: Web platform for investment management. Created reusable components, adapted the site to multiple devices, consumed backend APIs, styled with SASS, and contributed to backend changes with C# and .NET.
